10947Journal of Structural ChemistryJ Struct Chem0022-47661573-8779SP MAIK Nauka/InterperiodicaDordrechtS002247661202031X203110.1134/S002247661202031XArticleStructure of a framework coordination polymer Zn2(dmf)(H2O)(atc)]·0.75DMF·0.5H2OZavakhinaM. S.12aSamsonenkoD. G.12YutkinM. P.13DybtsevD. N.13FedinV. P.12grid.4886.20000000121929124A. V. Nikolaev Institute of Inorganic Chemistry, Siberian DivisionRussian Academy of SciencesNovosibirskRussiagrid.4605.70000000121896553Novosibirsk State UniversityNovosibirskRussiagrid.49100.3c0000000107424007Pohang University of Science and TechnologyPohangRepublic of Koreacluster@niic.nsc.ru25520123201253240841222520125420112552012© Pleiades Publishing, Ltd. 20122012Abstract

In the interaction of Zn(NO3)2·6H2O and adamantane-1,3,5,7-tetracarboxylic acid (H4atc) in N,N′-dimethyl formamide (DMF) a three-dimensional coordination polymer with the composition [Zn2(dmf)(H2O)(atc)]·0.75DMF·0.5H2O (1) is produced. Its structure is determined by a single crystal X-ray diffraction study.

elements.content: In the interaction of Zn(NO3)2·6H2O and adamantane-1,3,5,7-tetracarboxylic acid (H4atc) in N,N′-dimethyl formamide (DMF) a three-dimensional coordination polymer with the composition [Zn2(dmf)(H2O)(atc)]·0.75DMF·0.5H2O (1) is produced. Its structure is determined by a single crystal X-ray diffraction study.
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

In the interaction of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O and adamantane-1,3,5,7-tetracarboxylic acid (H4atc) in N,N'-dimethyl formamide (DMF) a three-dimensional coordination polymer with the composition [Zn2(dmf)(H2O)(atc)]⋅0.75DMF⋅0.5H2O (1) is produced. Its structure is determined by a single crystal X-ray diffraction study.
